name: Formulator Sample Shop - FSS Pomegranate Sterols
description: Formulator Sample Shop offers FSS Pomegranate Sterols - a natural replacement for synthetic materials (petrolatum) and animal-derived materials (lanolin). Pomegranate-derived phytosterols provide barrier support with clean beauty appeal. Ideal for vegan cosmetics and natural formulations targeting small-scale formulators.
notes: Natural replacement for synthetic petrolatum and animal-derived lanolin. Pomegranate-derived provides unique positioning. Vegan and clean beauty appeal. Small quantities available for formulation development and testing. Excellent for natural formulations and vegan cosmetics.
